participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Creative and laid-back, enjoys expressing himself through music and art.
participant_1.background: i like to watch nhl hockey. i live is a rural farming community. i enjoy coloring books. i have a german shepherd dog.

participant_2.name: Emma
participant_2.personality: Energetic and practical, with a love for animals and a passion for dance.
participant_2.background: i compete in dog agility classes. i hate the color orange. i went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore. i do not care about fashion. i dance on the weekends.
